document_data.name: A Guide to Avernus - One Hellish Holiday
document_data.mainbody: '''''A Guide to Avernus - One Hellish Holiday''''' was a guidebook dedicated to [[Avernus]], the first layer of the [[Nine Hells]], penned for planeswalkers sometime before the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Content: The overview of Avernus included information on the plane's geography and a primer on its inhabitants, and their involvement in the endless [[Blood War]]. The politics section of the book was a collection of asterisks, addendums, and corrections on the fluid and chaotic chain of command under the Archduke of Avernus, [[Zariel]].
